title: Cap Stand, mid-18th century
creditline: Bequest of Richard Cranch Greenleaf in memory of his mother, Adeline Emma Greenleaf
description: Blue and mauve (manganese) 'Garden" flowers and a bee on globe. Ring of leaves at base of neck. Circles at edge of foot and top of globe.

tombstone.epitaph:
Cap Stand, mid-18th century.
mid-18th century. Earthenware; faience, underglaze decoration. Bequest of Richard Cranch Greenleaf in memory of his mother, Adeline Emma Greenleaf. 1962-60-6.
